jQuery and bootstrap Upload Examples

File Upload Control with multiple file selection, drag&drop support, progress bars, validation and preview images, audio and video for jQuery UI.

1. Bootstrap File Upload Demo

This is a bootstrap theme of uploader. You can make uploader look exactly how you want it to look and it's very easy to do so.

2. jQuery File Upload Demo

This is a jQuery theme of uploader. You can make uploader look exactly how you want it to look and it's very easy to do so.
